base.name: 英语
base.publisher: 外语教学与研究出版社（外研社）
base.description: 系统知识库(含单词、短语、句型)

items.zh_hint: 肯定的，确信的，有把握的
意想不到的事；不同寻常的事
强健的，健壮的；力气大的
我是一名球类运动明星。
我会踢足球/打篮球/打乒乓球。

items.en_text: I’m not a ball game star.
items.zh_hint: 我不是一名球类运动明星。
我不会踢足球/打篮球/打乒乓球。

items.en_text: I can stand on my head.
--What can you do, Ben? --I can run and swim. --
items.zh_hint: 本，你会做什么？ --跑步和游泳。

items.en_text: --What's your favourite sport, Li Shuai? --Kung fu. --
items.zh_hint: 李帅，你最喜欢的运动是什么？ --功夫。

items.en_text: --What can you do, Wu Yu? --I can kick and jump. --
items.zh_hint: 吴宇，你会做什么？ --踢腿和跳跃。
米娅，你最喜欢的运动是什么？ --乒乓球。

items.en_text: Put on this magic band, and you can run fast.
items.zh_hint: 戴上这个魔法腕带，你就能跑得快了。

items.en_text: It’s windy today. You can stay at home, Nana.
items.zh_hint: 今天刮风了，娜娜，你可以待在家里。

items.en_text: Thank you for the magic band!
Try your best! You can do anything!
items.zh_hint: 尽你最大的努力！你可以做任何事！

items.en_text: We can’t play ping-pong outside on a windy day, but we can fly a kite.
items.zh_hint: 刮风天我们不能在外面打乒乓球，但我们可以放风筝。

items.en_text: --Xia Lin, can you swim / play football? --Yes, I can. / No, I can’t. --
items.zh_hint: 夏琳，你会游泳吗？/会踢足球吗？ --是的，我会。/不，我不会。

items.en_text: She can’t run, but she can ride her wheelchair very fast.
items.zh_hint: 她不能跑，但她能很快地骑轮椅。

items.en_text: He can’t see, but he can jump very far.
items.zh_hint: 他看不见，但他能跳得很远。

items.en_text: She can’t run fast, but she can swim really fast.
items.zh_hint: 她不能跑得很快，但她游得真的很快。

items.en_text: He can’t walk, but he can ski.
items.zh_hint: 他不能走路，但他会滑雪。

items.en_text: on one’s side of the street ……
You can get the best ice cream.
items.zh_hint: 你能买到最好的冰淇淋。

items.en_text: See you there at eight. Bye-bye!
Let’s go to the Rainbow Bookshop today.
items.zh_hint: 今天我们去彩虹书店吧。

items.en_text: Jane Smith is going to be there.
Can you tell me the way to the Rainbow Bookshop, please?
items.zh_hint: 你能告诉我去彩虹书店的路吗？

items.en_text: Go straight on to the supermarket and turn right.
The bookshop is on your left.
Why don’t you go with us?
items.zh_hint: 为什么不和我们一起去呢？

items.en_text: Are you going there to buy books?
We want to meet Jane Smith.

items.zh_hint: 她是我们最喜欢的作家。

items.en_text: Her book *A Big Surprise* is my favourite book.
items.zh_hint: 她的书《一个大惊喜》是我最喜欢的书。

items.en_text: Do you want to meet Jane Smith, too?
Well… I can see her very often.
Thank you for showing me the way.
Why do Pit and Pat want to go to the Rainbow Bookshop?
items.zh_hint: 皮特和帕特为什么想去彩虹书店？

items.en_text: Why does Jane Smith say thank you to Pit and Pat?
items.zh_hint: 简·史密斯为什么向皮特和帕特说谢谢？

items.en_text: Come out of the Rainbow Bookshop and turn right.
items.zh_hint: 从彩虹书店出来然后向右转。

items.en_text: Go straight on and then turn right at the cinema.
items.zh_hint: 直走，然后在电影院处右转。

items.en_text: Mr Grey lives next to the bus stop.
items.zh_hint: 格雷先生住在公交站旁边。

items.en_text: Mr Black lives opposite Mr Grey.
items.zh_hint: 布莱克先生住在格雷先生对面。

items.en_text: Mr Blue lives on Mr Black’s side of the street.
items.zh_hint: 布鲁先生住在布莱克先生所在的街道一侧。

items.en_text: Mr Green does not live on Mr White’s side of the street.
items.zh_hint: 格林先生不住在怀特先生所在的街道一侧。

items.en_text: This is my map. My home is here.
items.zh_hint: 这是我的地图，我家在这里。

items.en_text: I see people in my town.

items.zh_hint: 他们都热爱自己的工作！

items.en_text: My mother works in a school.
My father works in a restaurant.
My sister works in a hospital.
I’m looking for a fun job.
items.zh_hint: 我在找一份有趣的工作。
你可以建造美丽的花园。

items.en_text: I like helping people. I can run fast, too.
items.zh_hint: 我喜欢帮助人们，我也能跑得很快。
成为一名消防员怎么样？

items.en_text: What about being a window cleaner?
items.zh_hint: 成为一名窗户清洁工怎么样？

items.en_text: What a lovely job I’ve got!
items.zh_hint: 我找到了一份多么可爱的工作！
我喜欢守护人们的安全。

items.en_text: I want to be a policeman / ....
I like science. And I like asking questions.
items.zh_hint: 我喜欢科学，也喜欢提问。

items.en_text: I love learning about space. I want to go to the moon!
items.zh_hint: 我热爱学习太空知识，我想去月球！

items.en_text: I like helping sick children. I want to look after them.
items.zh_hint: 我喜欢帮助生病的孩子，我想照顾他们。

items.en_text: Want to know more? Get in touch with us.
items.zh_hint: 想了解更多？与我们取得联系。

items.en_text: What kind of people do they want?
How much is a pair of trousers?
How much are three pairs of socks?
How much are two pairs of shoes?
How much are a pair of shorts and a pair of trousers?
items.zh_hint: 一条短裤和一条长裤一共多少钱？

items.en_text: Wow! So many people and so many things!
items.zh_hint: 哇！这么多人，这么多东西！

items.en_text: Can I have it for twenty yuan? It’s all I have.
items.zh_hint: 我能用20元买它吗？这是我所有的钱了。

items.en_text: I can buy it for you.
No, thanks, Dad. I can work it out.
items.zh_hint: 不用了，谢谢爸爸。我可以自己想办法。

items.en_text: Now I have the money to buy that skateboard.
items.zh_hint: 现在我有钱买那个滑板了。

items.en_text: Hi. Here is seventy yuan for the skateboard.
By the way, do you want to go skateboarding with me?
items.zh_hint: 顺便问一下，你想和我一起去玩滑板吗？

items.en_text: Now Tutu has a new skateboard and a new friend.
items.zh_hint: 现在图图有了一个新滑板和一个新朋友。

items.en_text: Early in the morning, I go shopping.
Then I buy fifty bananas for one hundred yuan.
I draw a cat and a strawberry.
items.zh_hint: 我画了一只猫和一颗草莓。

items.en_text: Dew wants to buy a few new toys.
How many brown cows can you see?
items.zh_hint: 你能看到多少头棕色的牛？

items.en_text: She plays Snow White in the show.
items.zh_hint: 她在表演里扮演白雪公主。

items.en_text: Now I can say numbers from eleven to one hundred.
items.zh_hint: 现在我会说11到100的数字了。

items.en_text: We should use our money in right ways.
items.zh_hint: 我们应该正确地使用我们的钱。

items.en_text: a circle / a square / a triangle
items.zh_hint: 一个圆形/一个正方形/一个三角形

items.en_text: a rectangle / a star / a heart
items.zh_hint: 一个长方形/一颗星形/一个心形图案

items.en_text: at the top / at the bottom
on the left / on the right
How many triangles are there in the picture?
There are three circles and two squares.
items.zh_hint: 有三个圆和两个正方形。

items.en_text: The big star is in the middle.
At the top of the cake, there is a heart.
items.zh_hint: 蛋糕最上面有一个心形。

items.en_text: I’d like a slice of pizza, please.
I’d like some salad and a glass of milk.
items.zh_hint: 我想要一些沙拉和一杯牛奶。

items.en_text: Pizza is tasty, but it’s not very healthy.
items.zh_hint: 披萨很好吃，但不是很健康。
让我们做一幅形状画吧。

items.en_text: Can you find a triangle and a rectangle?
items.zh_hint: 你能找到一个三角形和一个长方形吗？

items.en_text: Shapes can make pictures of food.
items.zh_hint: 形状可以拼出食物的图案。

items.en_text: a big elephant / a small cat
a tall giraffe / a cute panda
items.zh_hint: 一只高高的长颈鹿/一只可爱的熊猫

items.en_text: a long nose / a long neck
Look! The elephants are so big and strong.
The giraffe has a very long neck.
Monkeys can climb trees and jump.
I have a new pet hamster.
items.zh_hint: 我有一只新的宠物仓鼠。

items.en_text: I feed it and clean its cage every day.
items.zh_hint: 我每天喂它并打扫它的笼子。

items.en_text: We must be kind to animals.
Don’t touch the animals at the zoo.
items.zh_hint: 不要在动物园随便摸动物。
你最喜欢的动物是什么？

items.en_text: I like cats because they are cute.
items.zh_hint: 我喜欢猫，因为它们很可爱。

descriptions: 课本末尾的 Play 板块（原 unit_code=Plays）。
